content.text:
# List of Ashden Award winners

The following is a list of the winners of the Ashden Awards, grouped by year.
Full details of their work can be found in the [https://web.archive.org/web/20080918094923/http://www.ashdenawards.org/case_studies database on the Ashden Awards website].
